Reviews.Title: “Very nice place, great host!”
Reviews.Author: Kiwwwi
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay. I stayed there for 3 nights. It is very close to the hawker food market (great food!) and a 10 minute walk from the MRT (easy and cheap transport by train). You basically walk 10 minutes, take the MRT to Chinatown, Little India and definitely must go is Marina Bay at night. The Skyline of Singapore is just breathtaking. Didn´t go up the Flyer (biiiig Ferris Wheel at Marina Bay) because it was 30$ per person. Jon, the receptionist was great! He helped us a lot, explained where to go which bus to take etc. He also offers daily free tours around an area of Singapore not in the lonely planet (5pm) which is great since he showed us where the locals go to pray, how to pray in the temples and the meaning of the different rituals. He also took us to a foodcourt for a typical Singapore food. One negative about the dorm room: We stayed upstairs next to the rooftop area which was quite noisy until late at night. That is probably not so bad, but after 11 hour flight and jetlag it is just annoying. Apart from that, the room were small but clean, air conditioned but bathrooms very small. I would still recommend it, because Jon made us feel welcome from the beginning and also good place to get to know people.

Reviews.Title: “Best in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Peter A
Reviews.Content: Best hostel i have ever been to! And Jonathan is the best staf, good nice cleen rooms and just awsome! If you go to Singapore Little Red Dot is the place to stay at! The night out with Jonathan where perfect he was taken us to the best bars and we dident have to stay in line or pay entrence!

Reviews.Title: “The best place in Singapore!!!”
Reviews.Author: Nini82Brisbane
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the little red dot during Easter and I really had a good time. I was traveling alone but once i arrived in the little red dot you found friends and a family!!! The place is small but that makes it even more cozy. The rooms are very clean so the bathroom and toilet. The staff is super friendly and helpful. I have never stayed in a place where the staff was so nice and i have been traveling now for almost 5 months. I can highly recommend this place and I will definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Staying with the family...”
Reviews.Author: K0elscheJung
Reviews.Content: I stayed twice at LRD and it was perfect! Great staff and rooms. Everything is very familiar, nice and clean. You want to see Singapore with local eyes? Stay at LRD and ask for Jonathan. He will show you the best spots for eat, drink and nightlife! I will come back soon...

Reviews.Title: “Best Hostel in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: E-star25
Reviews.Content: I dont even need to try out other hostels to know this is the best one for this price. Manager is very friendly, really did everything to help me out from the very moment I arrived. Jonathan and Soesoe are very hard workers. Its clean, everybody is very kind and helpfull. They will tell you the best places to go to, or even take you there themselves on a tour. Jonathans food list is deffinitely worth trying! One thing i just would vote for is one extra person in the staff to help out (even a part time one would make alot of difference I think). Because working such long hours will have a negative effect on Soesoe's and Jonathan's best qualities at some moment. Why would you exhaust your staff like that if they're probably the best staff you could possibly have...They are what makes the hostel what it is right now, they diserve way more recognition and respect.

Reviews.Title: “A great hostel”
Reviews.Author: globetrottar-22
Reviews.Content: Little Red Dot is a perfect place to stay in Singapore if you want a cheap and clean hostel with frendly and helpfull staff. The metro is not fare away, you get free breakfast and wifi.

Reviews.Title: “Nice staff, great atmosphere, clean”
Reviews.Author: vdbina
Reviews.Content: nice hostel with everything you could ask for. Awesome staff, took us out one night. No kitchen, but cheap and good food court just around the corner. Nice rooftoop sitting area. Location is a little out of the main city, but close to the MRT station. All in all a good place to stay. Would stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and lovely place!!!”
Reviews.Author: Moonphoenix
Reviews.Content: Knew this hostel through my friend.Glad to have the chance to stay here,felt the local life and enjoyed the tasty curry rice from Jonathan,the nice staff.Had a wonderful night on the rooftop,where you could enjoy the breeze,good drink,nice chat with other guests from hostel,playing card,and relaxing.Such a simple joy in Singapore,like it.:)

Reviews.Title: “Fun fun fun!”
Reviews.Author: 369amanda
Reviews.Content: Little red dot is fun :) The staff is awesome, the people are cool, the location is great and there is a ps3 :) Free breakfast and internet :) Girls only rooms with a/c and hot showers, what else do you want in a hostel??? I had a great time there, with special thanks to the receptionist :)

Reviews.Title: “the special thing is you feel like youre coming home”
Reviews.Author: binnichda
Reviews.Content: i have been in the little red dot two times, and it was very nice. my second visit felt like i am coming home, is is very simple to get in touch with the friendly staff and so you can get some great insider tips about singapore. the rooms are clean with an airconditioner, the atmosphere is cosy, you have free internet at free pcs. upstairs is a little terrace where you can chill or can get burned. breakfast is included: toast and flakes. that was fine for me. the hostel is located about a 7 min walk from the mrt station lavender street from where you can get everywhere within an half hour. all in all: thumps up!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic place with great people”
Reviews.Author: Trip0fmyLife
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the @Little Red Dot for 5 nights during my stay in Singapore. And it made made my stay very special. Jonathan is the best guid you can get in Singaore, recommendations of sightseeing places, typical local food and partying! The rooms and bathrooms are very clean. Simple but good breakfast. Lot of movies to choose for watching and if its a day with too much rain or just to chill out at the hostel, there are also video games available. Very centraly, just 10 minutes walk to the next MRT station, easy to find. Would always come back! Miss you guys already!!!

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hostels i have stayed in!!”
Reviews.Author: wonderingtraveller80
Reviews.Content: We had a great time staying here, we meet some great people there and the layout off the hostels makes in easy to interact with other people. The rooms were clean and the bedding was clean too. The bathroom were kept clean and had hot running water all the day long. The staff were friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. Free beakfast and wifi.

Reviews.Title: “First Time in a Hostel has Never been this Good!”
Reviews.Author: cexssy
Reviews.Content: It's my first time staying in a hostel, at first I'm afraid but since I'm with my mom, It's not that bad to give it a try. Little Red Dot's location, security, and cleanliness is good and I love their free breakfast! I just had a problem with their wifi, I can't connect thru my laptop but thru my iphone, I can. Some of the guests experience the same. Also, they're turning off the air-conditioner from 12noon to 7:00pm. So don't stay in the hostel between those hours. In terms of their staff, I don't like Jonathan. In some of the reviews, the guests say that Jonathan is the good guy. Yes he is, to those people who gives him alcohol drinks! Every night he's drunk! He initiates noise especially at night! Some of the guests don't like him because of his habit. He's arrogant to guests whom he thinks he can't get a drink! I really want to commend SUSU... one of the hostel's staff. He's the real good guy! He doesn't drink and he always clean the hostel. Unlike Jonathan who always drink alcohol and I have never seen him cleaning the hostel! Geeeezz!!! Anyway, I really like Susu, he's accommodating and an honest guy! :) TIP: Don't go with the map that Little Red Dot Hostel's will provide when they send an email to you for booking confirmation. It's inconvenient to walk at the back area of the place especially at night. I think it's not secure to walk there. Just do this: when you're taking the MRT, as you exit the terminal (Lavender Station), turn left then up to the escalator. Turn left again, go straight to the main road, then turn left again go straight and you'll pass by Fragrance Hostel then Hotel 81, from there, I think just a 5-minute walk, you'll see the Little Red Dot! :)

Reviews.Title: “Best hostel in Singapore!”
Reviews.Author: Susannak90
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay at the little red dot, the place is modern and clean and staff is very friendly! Jonathan was such a nice guy to show us around Singapore and its nightlife! Would definately recommend this place! Thank you for an awesome time!

Reviews.Title: “Clean hostel, knowledgeable staff, and excellent location”
Reviews.Author: RyanBrauchler
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Little Red Dot was fantastic. Jonathan and the rest of the staff are extremely helpful at finding things to do for the guests and even organizing tours for the guests. The hostel itself is incredibly clean and well kept, though the rooms themselves can feel extremely crowded. The location of the hostel, however is excellent and provides for easy access to the MRT station and therefore the rest of Singapore. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Super!”
Reviews.Author: AncySmolders
Reviews.Content: I've been travelling for over a month now and this was one of the best places I stayed at. Clean rooms and enough space with lockers. Bathrooms are also very clean and have hot water. It's near Little India and close to the MRT station and a big foodcourt. There is a common room where you can meet a lot of people and get to know the staff better. They are all very friendly and helpfull, but I loved Jonathan the most. He's a great guy and made my stay unforgettable. I recommend this to everybody and hope to get back there one day!

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and friendly Hostel!”
Reviews.Author: Thomas Z
Reviews.Content: Very nice and familiar hostel. Room and facilities were clean and with aircondition. Wifi for free and just 5 Minutes to MRT station. 200 m away there is a big food court with very good and cheap asian food. Staff was friendly as well. Furthermore i forgot my drivers lisence at the hostel and they sent it back to Germany for free!

Reviews.Title: “Little Red Dot: the place to be!”
Reviews.Author: 02traveller2012
Reviews.Content: When you want to enjoy your trip, you should go to the little red dot and spent your time with Jonathan :-D ! If I'm once again in Singapore, I'll definitely come back!!! Greetings from Germany

Reviews.Title: “a MUST visit!”
Reviews.Author: kseab
Reviews.Content: The hostel was amazing, really good location, clean and SO much fun. The best part is the hospitality (especially Jonathan - he's so great). The staff is extremely helpful and will make your stay in Singapore one to remember. I definitely recommend this as a place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “could be so much better!”
Reviews.Author: Vivich
Reviews.Content: First of all, the location. it is 7min walk from the Lavender MRT station as they say. The area is nice, and close to Little India but there's nothing much to see around the hostel. Otherwise we can walk to the town, it takes about 25-30min to reach a more touristic point or we can just simply take the subway. I spend 3 nights in this hostel in an 8 bed dorm. When I arrived (early at 8am), the guy was so sleepy, he didn't even say hello, not a smile but the other people that I met were really nice and helpful. The check in is at 3pm so until that time we can let our luggage at the hostel for free. about the room, my dorm was just next to the living area/kitchen....so it was so noisy!! bring your earplugs just in case if you can't stand the noise. There are lockers in the room (but lockers not provided) the beds are simple but confortable. there are showers to share outside the dorms, they are cleans but not very pratical because you don't really know where to put all your stuff. as for the breakfast, there are tea, cereals and bread with exotic marmelad, but I have to say that I didn't even try it because the food is so cheap and good in singapore that I never eat once at the hostel (even though, I don't even think that there is a kitchen there...) so to conclude, I think the hostel is not bad, maybe I didn't have the best room, I can't say don't go there because it is a nice place after all, but improvement can be done.

Reviews.Title: “Jonathan made Singapore so much better!”
Reviews.Author: Lyrran
Reviews.Content: Really nice staff. Especiilly Jonathan. Helps you out with whatever or let you get the chance to know SIngapore for real. Anything from party too food courts and what to eat. Cheapest living and at a great location, Nice hostel with the most things to offer. Would gladly revisit for next Singapore visit.

Reviews.Title: “Little red dot - excellent stay in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Lisa H
Reviews.Content: I stayed two nights at Little red dot in Singapore and I really enjoyed it. The staff there was amazing and really had a personal touch in their service, especially Jonathan who gave me really good advice about what to do and see in Singapore and also of course, what to eat :) I stayed in a female bed dorm and the room was always clean. The breakfast was for free which was good - cereals, toast, tea and coffe. I would definitely recommend this hostel to my friends, and if I ever visit Singapore again, I know where to stay :)

Reviews.Title: “The best night in my trip!”
Reviews.Author: Waterfallwasgreat
Reviews.Content: I was only one night in The little red dot, but that was the best night in my trip. People are so friendly, Jonathan is sooo great specially if you want go to night life ;) thanks for everything! I'll be back..

Reviews.Title: “lovely place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Elisa080289
Reviews.Content: Last December I had the pleasure of staying in Singapore for a couple of days at the Little Red Dot, which was definitely the best place to stay. The Hostel is very clean and the staff is amazing! Especially Jonathan <3 is a realy great guy. He is very knowledgeable and made my singaporeexperience so much better! You immidiatly feel welcome around him. Also one night I went clubbing with him...it was an unforgettable night! I will definitily come back to the little red dot if I visit Singapore again.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly hostel”
Reviews.Author: henhern
Reviews.Content: Great hostel in Singapore, clean and very comfortable. Superfriendly and helpful staff! Jonathan will help you with pretty much everything :) Ask him about help for some good food if you want to try something new. The Hostel is close to metro and little india. The metro is also close to the airport which can be nice if your arriving/leaving from there.

Reviews.Title: “This place is amazing!!”
Reviews.Author: Fons1994
Reviews.Content: The little red dot is a very nice place to stay. The staff (especially Jonathan) is amazing and very friendly. The place itself got everything you need; clean rooms with aircon, good bathroom, free wifi, computers and it's very near the centre. With Jonathan we went out for dinner 3 times! He's a real great guy and made my experience of staying in Singapore much better!

Reviews.Title: “Epic”
Reviews.Author: jorizzer
Reviews.Content: At the little red dot I had an epic stay. The location is great, close to metro and bus, you're in the centre of Singapore in 10 minutes. Just one block away there's the best hawkerstallcenter of Singapore, we had couple of epic mealtimes there! Staff is great, ask for Jonathan, you'll have lots of fun. Furthermore, clean dorms and bathrooms. I'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Good price value”
Reviews.Author: Hannnnes
Reviews.Content: + nice rooftop + rooms/bathrooms were clean + aircon in the nights + free wifi/internet + bookshelf + central location...near to bus/metro station, chinatown in walking distance + luggage storage service, stored my luggage for several weeks (2SD/Day) + free (average hostel) breakfast - some boring people surfing the internet/playing xbox the whole day Jonathon (he is working there) is a superfriendly companion, smiling all the time and takes really care of his guests. He tries to help wherever he can. In the nights, after his shifts, he takes you to cheap/good food places and parties. Without him, the hostel would only be an average one. The rest of the crew is decent friendly, however seemed sometimes to be a little bit annoyed at work. Very good price/value and I can absolutely recommend this hostel!

Reviews.Title: “Best hostel i've been to”
Reviews.Author: jesank
Reviews.Content: Very clean and nice place and the staff is excellent, especially a guy called jonathan who really knows how to take care of his guests! You get free wifi, free usage of their computers, breakfast and a lot of movies and video games. This is definitely the place to stay at in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Awsome hostel!”
Reviews.Author: Thd90
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the little red dot (in the girls doorm) for 3 nights, and it was a really awsome hostel! The staff was super friendly, and gave me good tips on what to see in singapore and where to party =) With clean beds and toilets, free internet and service-minded staff, made my singapore vacation super! PS. remeber to check out the location, the description provided by the hostel was not that detailed.....

Reviews.Title: “Best staff and service!”
Reviews.Author: gunwen
Reviews.Content: I think the headline says it the best. If you need help with anything or some company during the evening it's all there. Also close to good and cheap food.

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: OlavBias
Reviews.Content: Cheap, good location near little India and also near the subway. Awsome staff especially jonathan.

Reviews.Title: “Emily”
Reviews.Author: teknolovesong
Reviews.Content: Nice hostell, easy to meet new people and the staff is great! Very clean and good location near the subway and many restaurants. If you like to try som good food ask Jonathan to take you for dinner.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, clean and quite close to the subway”
Reviews.Author: sebnil
Reviews.Content: Nice staff and a great place to stay! I will come back if I visit Singapore again.

Reviews.Title: “A true star named Jonathan...”
Reviews.Author: Natasha_B09
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this wonderfully friendly hostel last year and wow did I have a fantastic experience. This is not just down to the fact that it was centrally located, or due to the fact I was able to get so much information on things to do and how to get around, this was all down to the main man himself, Jonathan Lin. Jonathan single hand-idly made me and partner feel welcome, safe, happy, excited and drunk! If it wasn't for Jonathan I don't even think I would be writing this review as I had to tell all other travelers about the amazing individual who will do anything to make sure you enjoy your time in Singapore. I have sent along 3 different groups of friends to this hostel since I last stayed and they have all been well looked after. Thank you Jonathan for ensuring this. All in all, the hostel has similar facilities as the other hostels in the area, free wifi, breakfast etc but what makes this different is the staff. I look forward to my return to the little red dot!

Reviews.Title: “preeetty awesome”
Reviews.Author: susana0309
Reviews.Content: Cozy and fun place, great location! The breakfast was pretty good, the staff was really nice, and the internet free. Great place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “i'd defo come back”
Reviews.Author: sonja013
Reviews.Content: Last November I had the pleasure to stay in Singapore for a couple of days. By accident i ended up staying at the red dot (it was cheaper then the one I was staying before). The facilities are quite similiar to most of the Singaporean hostels - the difference lies with the staff in particular Jonathan. He made my last night in Singapore a blast. As a Singaporean he knows all the secrets about his home town and he doesn't hesitate to share them with you. the rooms are kinda small but with Jonathan you won't stay in your room any way!

Reviews.Title: “red dot hostel”
Reviews.Author: evelient
Reviews.Content: It's a really good hostel; clean, cheap and close to the subway. The staff is nice, in particular Jonathan, who showed us the Singaporean nightlife, which was fun!

Reviews.Title: “Little Red Dot is the best!!”
Reviews.Author: Mari5503
Reviews.Content: If you go to Singapore, you definitely should stay here! The Little Red Dot has a great atmosphere, is very clean and has everything you need (comfy couches, TV, free internet, hot showers). Great value and location as well. The staff was awesome!! Jonathan was so helpful and FUN. He introduced my friend and me to some delicious new foods at the food court and we had many laughs with him. We are so glad we stayed at The Little Red Dot and I highly recommend it to any travelers looking for a fun/chilled place in Singapore!!

Reviews.Title: “Fun spot, great value!”
Reviews.Author: NatalieUSA
Reviews.Content: The Little Red Dot is such a fantastic hostel. Not only is it unbelievably cheaper than any other accommodation around, but it was an enjoyable stay! A manageable number of people per room, clean bathrooms, free internet on community computers, good breakfast, helpful staff (<3 ya Jonathon!), friendly guests, and a convenient location (in China Town, near Little India). I was only in Singapore for a weekend, but it was such an amazing trip that I'll always cherish. The Little Red Dot was a perfect place for my friend and I to stay for our visit!

Reviews.Title: “Worth every Dollar”
Reviews.Author: Lion S
Reviews.Content: Jonathan is very skilled and knowledgeable manager. He does it all with a smile. Littel red dot is the spot! The house is very clean and it has all the things that you want. It offers a clean showers and toilets for all the guests so that there is no rush in the morning as the usual backpacker. The free internet, gaming (xbox) the four free desktop computers make it worth to indulge yourself a bit longer. The free breakfast is nice plus and you can grab a cold coke or beer at any time of the day for a decent price. The rooms a functional and clean with air-con at night time. Its just a short walk for the MRT and bus stops right in front of the house. All the questions that i had were answered in a very professional manner. I will come back. Lion from Switzerland

Reviews.Title: “Best Hostel in Town!”
Reviews.Author: hanz W
Reviews.Content: Douring my 1,5 year trip around the world and many many of Hostels, I think Little Red Dot is on of the top 5 hostels I have stayed. Its clean and nice. My plan was to stay only 3 nights but I liked it so mutch that I ended up staying for about 10! The best thing about the hostel in one of the main staff Jonathan. He was super helpfull, he told me all attraktions in the city and how to get there, he showed me and other guests the real Singapore by invited us for dinner in different haka center he also bought us realy singapore food YAMMI! Every evening we went clubbing with him and again also showed us the bes places and clubs in town! I had a great time in Singapore, thanks to the Little Red Dot team especially Jonathan!

Reviews.Title: “Great hostel, great location, close to train station”
Reviews.Author: rima55
Reviews.Content: My first stay in a hostel was at this place and I was absolutely delighted. Great, friendly, helpful staff. CLean rooms, free internet at 3 computers and free WiFi was fantastic. Great location, close to Lavender train station which connects to everywhere within walking distance of Chinatown, LIttle India and Arab St-happy to recommend this place to others

Reviews.Title: “I LOVE LITTLE RED DOT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Anonymous426
Reviews.Content: OMG!! I LOVE THIS PLACE SO MUCH :) i had the best time in singapore and it was all because of JONATHON LIN ;) He made my friend and I feel so welcome! and gave the best advice about what to do it the city! Something that we couldnt have managed on our own! I would def recommend this Hostel who wants to have a good time at the coolest place in Singapore! It was a great place, quiet at night! and super social during the day! 5 STARS :)

Reviews.Title: “Good staff”
Reviews.Author: Chudzik
Reviews.Content: I had a very good time at this hostel. Place was very clean. But the best part was the staff, particularly Jonathan, who helped us a lot!

Reviews.Title: “A spontaneous trip that became amazing”
Reviews.Author: g_r_ess_11
Reviews.Content: This was just a visa run weekend trip, but it became amazing because of the awesome people me and my friend and traveling companion met at the @Little Red dot Hostel. We asked for help from Jonathan Lin at the Hostel on how to go to the MacRitchie Reservior. We had an amazing day of hiking and then returned to the Hostel here we met people who we went out with that evening and went to Tanjong beach with the next day. The Hostel was clean and well decorated with amazingly helpful staff like Jonathan who I actually ran into when I went out one of the nights I was there. We had a great time taking in some outdoors, clubbing, and relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome time with quality FRIENDS!”
Reviews.Author: Rikki T
Reviews.Content: This hostel is a just Awesome! It's clean, comfortable, well priced, fun and everyone just wants to have a good time. What made it though had to be Jonathan Lin. For me he really was the life and soul of the place and couldn't have been more helpful. Jonathan was a true legend, he knew everything and took us out to have the best pork belly i have ever had! On the back of our stay I have sent friends here and they have all said the same. Great hostel but what makes it is Jonathan.

Reviews.Title: “Great hostel! Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: jeilerman_11
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the little red dot for a few weeks during an internship in Singapore. The staff is very helpful. They can answer any question you have about Singapore. My experience was great! Very clean and decent accommodations. I would recommend this hostel without hesitation. Also if you get to meet Jonathan(Red Dot staff member) he will show you where all the great nightlife is. Def a plus.

Reviews.Title: “Great staffs”
Reviews.Author: nujpn910
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice stay at this hostel!! The place was clean and the location was pretty good. The breakfast was also nice for the price. One of the staffs, Jonathan helped us a lot providing us information about good sightseeing points. He was also kind enough to contact us so many times when he received a call from the airport since the airline company made some mistake and my friend didn't recieve her luggage when we arrived in Singapore... All of the satffs were kind and made us feel comfortable even though we couldn't speak English very well. I would really recommend The Little Red Dot and I will defenitely stay at this place if I visit Singapore again!

Reviews.Title: “the best hostel i've ever stayed!”
Reviews.Author: novawu
Reviews.Content: The little Red Dot is definitely the best place to stay. It's easy to find and very convenient. The rooms are clean, the decoration's good. And i love to chill at the roof top anytime in a day, and the common area!! just to enjoy the fresh air and interesting conversations. and the staff here are so helpful and really really nice. You will get a lot more than what u spend here! I will definitely go check-in again if i go visit Singapore! Love it love it love it!

Reviews.Title: “Stay there for Jonathan.”
Reviews.Author: ajpaloalto
Reviews.Content: The amenities may not be top notch, but if you're in Singapore for an experience with a local who knows the ins, the outs, the highs and the lows, the sights, sounds and TASTES of Singapore, then the little red dot is your place. Jonathan, the concierge and resident awesome guy makes staying here worth every Singaporean dollar.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant hostel!”
Reviews.Author: laura1987186338
Reviews.Content: Had a brilliant time in this hostel! Jonathon was amazing and took us on a wicked night out!! Good location and friendly staff. Would definitely recommend little red dot

Reviews.Title: “The amazing little red dot.”
Reviews.Author: amwestman
Reviews.Content: Don't really know where I should start. The place is great. It has everything you can look for in a hostel. Great rooms, alot om facilities and the best of all, the best guy in the world. Jonathan that works there made Singapore just amazing. Me and my friends just planed 3 nights in singapore, but it ended with six nights.. Can't wait to come back and stay at little red dot again.

Reviews.Title: “Best staff”
Reviews.Author: Eloise_12345
Reviews.Content: The hostel is clean and the breakfast is simple but good for the price. The best thing about the hostel is the staff. The main guy working there was very helpful and definitely made our experience in Singapore even better! His advice on where to go on nights out/during the daytime/best places for food was excellent and much better than any guide book! We made a great friend and would go back without question!

Reviews.Title: “wicked place”
Reviews.Author: jjstennie
Reviews.Content: Little Red Dot, it location is just pretty to walk all of Singapore, start by going to Little India and make you way down through all of singapore, then metro it back at the end of the day. great atmosphere, good people working there, but i have one little gggrrrrr, the A/C is not from 10am until 6pm and if you are having a day indoors for what ever reason, (hangover, forward travel planning etc) you are stuffed, it gets too hot. but saying that if ever back in Singapore i wouldnt hestiate of my choice of hostel to stay at, i'll just sit in the metro station for a/c during the day lol enjoy. and info man is Johnathan. happy travelling from justine South Africa chick

Reviews.Title: “Johnathan made our time in Singapore!!”
Reviews.Author: lauraob89
Reviews.Content: Absolutely loved our time in this hostel. Having the free wifi and breakfast was brilliant as we were on a serious budget while travelling. Rooms and bathrooms were clean as was the common area. Johnathan really made our 4 days in singapore amazing. He was so helpful with all our questions and he brought us out for some traditional singapore food and a great night out:) Its close to the mrt so the whole of singapore is accessible from here. Would definitely reccommend!!

Reviews.Title: “Jonathon makes this hostel what it is.”
Reviews.Author: uihrijbkrjvbierjcbke
Reviews.Content: Firstly I'd just like to say that me and my boyfriend have travelled all through Europe, Asia and Australia and we believe its the people who run the hostel who really make it an enjoyable experience as well as the people you share your room with. Jonathon who works at the hostel has to be one of the most friendliest , nicest guys that we have met. He was so helpful and went well beyond he's care of duty to make sure that we were having a good time, which included going on nights out with us and showing us places to eat . He really made our stay there ! The hostel itself is really close to the train and doesnt take long to get to most amenities. Prices in Hong Kong are generally quite high and we found this to be one of the reasonable ones, which included a basic breakfast. The rooms and bathroom area are always kept clean and tidy and the guys who work there are happy to help with most things.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: star_anch0r
Reviews.Content: Little Red Dot is one of the Best Hostels I ever stayed in (and I stayed in quite a lot). It is situated just a few minutes from the next MRT and quite a lot of busses also leave from just over the street. All important places are very easy and fast to reach and Little India is just around the corner. The rooms are nice, simple and very clean. As well as the common areas where you can find TV and Sofas with a huge games and movies collection. But the absolutely BEST part about Little Red Dot is the incredibly awesome Staff, who are really friendly and helpful! They will show you the best places in Singapore, and you will get to eat the best food and can party a lot. I really enjoyed my stay there and will definitely come back. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: sporejo
Reviews.Content: I have been staying in the little red dot for several weeks now and I'm really glad that I found this great hostel. The atmosphere is really nice and I had a most pleasant stay so far. I would recommend it to any of my friends. The terrace on the roof top is a great place to chill and meet new people. The staff is great and very helpful and made me feel like home. Very good value for your money

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for backpackers on a budget In Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Chillthebeans
Reviews.Content: I stayed I'n Singapore for 3 night, two of which were at this hostel. It is 10 mins stroll from the mrt which is only a few stops away from airport or anywhere In the city centre! Singapore is most certainly not cheap so the price on the room was very good, but as long as u know this you won't be completely dishearten. The staff are extremely friendly and very helpful. I even got my back pack carries up the stairs to my room which is a far cry from anywhere i have stayed In SE Asia. This hostel has a lounge are where u can watch tv or play on xbox 360, also free Internet tea/coffee etc! I would recommend This to anyone on a budget I'n Singapore!

Reviews.Title: “cute, little hostel in the city”
Reviews.Author: Genii_79
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice, cute little hostel right in the center of everything. Clean rooms with air con. Friendly helpfull staff. Free brekky and wifi.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: rl86
Reviews.Content: this is a wonderful hostel, best i have stayed in. trust me i hv stayed in 50+ hostel in my years of travel. great location centrally and i can get anywhere in the city within minutes. saved me lots of $$$. Service of the staff was great, they were very friendly and made me feel at home. they also had attraction tickets to the night safarri, singapoer flyer, universal studio at a very good discounted price. I will recommend this place to all. Great job and keep it up!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and good service hostel”
Reviews.Author: JOECOOL10
Reviews.Content: pro -free wifi -24 hr access -clean rooms, bathrooms, -friendly service con -dont stay in mixed bed room dorm - its right next to the main road - and quite noisy! -its next to funeral homes
